name: $category
desc: Returns: High-level categorization of the type of activity in a care plan.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: High-level categorization of the type of activity in a care plan.

name: $definition
desc: Returns: Identifies the protocol, questionnaire, guideline or other specification the planned activity should be conducted in accordance with.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies the protocol, questionnaire, guideline or other specification the planned activity should be conducted in accordance with.

name: $code
desc: Returns: Detailed description of the type of planned activity; e.g. What lab test, what procedure, what kind of encounter.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Detailed description of the type of planned activity; e.g. What lab test, what procedure, what kind of encounter.

name: $reasonCode
desc: Returns: Provides the rationale that drove the inclusion of this particular activity as part of the plan or the reason why the activity was prohibited.

name: $addreasonCode
desc: Provides the rationale that drove the inclusion of this particular activity as part of the plan or the reason why the activity was prohibited.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Provides the rationale that drove the inclusion of this particular activity as part of the plan or the reason why the activity was prohibited.

name: $reasonReference
desc: Returns: Provides the health condition(s) that drove the inclusion of this particular activity as part of the plan.

name: $addreasonReference
desc: Provides the health condition(s) that drove the inclusion of this particular activity as part of the plan.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Provides the health condition(s) that drove the inclusion of this particular activity as part of the plan.

name: $goal
desc: Returns: Internal reference that identifies the goals that this activity is intended to contribute towards meeting.

name: $addgoal
desc: Internal reference that identifies the goals that this activity is intended to contribute towards meeting.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Internal reference that identifies the goals that this activity is intended to contribute towards meeting.

name: $status
desc: Returns: Identifies what progress is being made for the specific activity.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies what progress is being made for the specific activity.

name: $statusReason
desc: Returns: Provides reason why the activity isn't yet started, is on hold, was cancelled, etc.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Provides reason why the activity isn't yet started, is on hold, was cancelled, etc.

name: $prohibited
desc: Returns: If true, indicates that the described activity is one that must NOT be engaged in when following the plan.  If false, indicates that the described activity is one that should be engaged in when following the plan.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: If true, indicates that the described activity is one that must NOT be engaged in when following the plan.  If false, indicates that the described activity is one that should be engaged in when following the plan.

name: $location
desc: Returns: Identifies the facility where the activity will occur; e.g. home, hospital, specific clinic, etc.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies the facility where the activity will occur; e.g. home, hospital, specific clinic, etc.

name: $performer
desc: Returns: Identifies who's expected to be involved in the activity.

name: $addperformer
desc: Identifies who's expected to be involved in the activity.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies who's expected to be involved in the activity.

name: $dailyAmount
desc: Returns: Identifies the quantity expected to be consumed in a given day.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies the quantity expected to be consumed in a given day.

name: $quantity
desc: Returns: Identifies the quantity expected to be supplied, administered or consumed by the subject.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies the quantity expected to be supplied, administered or consumed by the subject.

name: $description
desc: Returns: This provides a textual description of constraints on the intended activity occurrence, including relation to other activities.  It may also include objectives, pre-conditions and end-conditions.  Finally, it may convey specifics about the activity such as body site, method, route, etc.

pvardefs.name: pValue
